sv:property.sv:value:

You may obtain a copy of the License at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. --> <#assign fmt=JspTaglibs["http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/fmt"]> <#assign hst=JspTaglibs["http://www.hippoecm.org/jsp/hst/core"]> <#assign ga=JspTaglibs["http://www.onehippo.org/jsp/google-analytics"]> <@hst.defineObjects /> <#assign lang="${hstRequest.locale.language!}" /> <#assign textSize="" /> <#if hstRequest.cookies?has_content> <#list hstRequest.cookies as cookie> <#if cookie.name == "fontSize"> <#assign textSize="${cookie.value}" /> <@hst.headContributions categoryExcludes="css,jsInternal,jsExternal,scripts" /> " /> " /> " /> <@hst.link var="yuicss" path="/css/yui-css.css"/> <@hst.link var="screencss" path="/css/screen.css"/> <#if hstRequest.requestContext.resolvedMount.mount.channelInfo.themeCss?has_content> <@hst.link var="themecss" path="/binaries${hstRequest.requestContext.resolvedMount.mount.channelInfo.themeCss}"/> <#if loggedin> <@hst.link var="resellercss" path="/css/reseller.css"/> <@hst.headContributions categoryIncludes="css"/> <@hst.link var="jquery" path="/js/jquery-1.9.1.js"/> <@hst.link var="jquerymbbrowser" path="/js/jquery.mb.browser.min.js"/> <@hst.link var="jqueryuicore" path="/js/jquery.ui.core.js"/> <@hst.link var="jqueryuidatepicker" path="/js/jquery.ui.datepicker.js"/> <@hst.link var="favicon" path="/images/favicon.ico"/> <@hst.link var="appletouchicon" path="/images/apple-touch-icon.png"/> <@hst.link var="rssHref" path="/rss" /> <@fmt.message var="rssTitle" key="standard.header.rss"/> style="font-size: ${textSize}px;">
<@hst.include ref="header"/> <@hst.include ref="main"/> <@hst.include ref="footer"/>
<@fmt.message key="layout.webpage.disclaimer"> <@fmt.param> <@fmt.param> <@fmt.param> <@fmt.param>
<@hst.link var="jscommon" path="/js/js-common.js"/> <#-- <@hst.link var="jquerytools" path="/js/jquery.tools.min.js"/> --> <@hst.headContributions categoryIncludes="jsExternal"/> <@hst.headContributions categoryIncludes="jsInternal"/> <#if !composermode> <@ga.accountId/> <@hst.link var="googleAnalytics" path="/resources/google-analytics.js"/> <@hst.headContributions categoryIncludes="scripts"/>

<#-- Copyright (C) 2010 Hippo B.V. Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. --> <#assign fmt=JspTaglibs["http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/fmt"]> <#assign hst=JspTaglibs["http://www.hippoecm.org/jsp/hst/core"]> <@hst.defineObjects/>
<@hst.include ref="topnav"/> <#assign lang=hstRequest.locale.language/> <@hst.link var="linkHome" siteMapItemRefId="home"/> <#if logo??> <@hst.link var="imgLogo" hippobean=logo.original />

<@hst.include ref="search"/> <@hst.include ref="langnavigation" /> <@hst.include ref="mainnavigation"/> <@hst.include ref="login"/>

<#-- Copyright (C) 2010 Hippo B.V. Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. --> <#assign fmt=JspTaglibs["http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/fmt"]> <#assign hst=JspTaglibs["http://www.hippoecm.org/jsp/hst/core"]>
<@hst.include ref="left"/> <@hst.include ref="content"/> <@hst.include ref="right"/>

<#-- Copyright (C) 2010 Hippo B.V. Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. --> <#assign fmt=JspTaglibs["http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/fmt"]> <#assign hst=JspTaglibs["http://www.hippoecm.org/jsp/hst/core"]> <#assign ga=JspTaglibs["http://www.onehippo.org/jsp/google-analytics"]> <@hst.defineObjects /> <#assign lang="${hstRequest.locale.language!}" /> <#assign textSize="" /> <#if hstRequest.cookies?has_content> <#list hstRequest.cookies as cookie> <#if cookie.name == "fontSize"> <#assign textSize="${cookie.value}" /> <@hst.headContributions categoryExcludes="css,jsInternal,jsExternal" /> " /> " /> " /> <@hst.link var="yuicss" path="/css/yui-css.css"/> <@hst.link var="screencss" path="/css/facebook/screen.css"/> <@hst.headContributions categoryIncludes="css"/> <@hst.link var="jquery" path="/js/jquery-1.4.2.min.js"/> <@hst.link var="favicon" path="/images/favicon.ico"/> <@hst.link var="appletouchicon" path="/images/apple-touch-icon.png"/> <@hst.link var="rssHref" path="/rss" /> <@fmt.message var="rssTitle" key="standard.header.rss"/> style="font-size: ${textSize}px;" <#if preview>class="facebook-preview">
<@hst.include ref="header"/> <@hst.include ref="main"/> <@hst.include ref="footer"/>
<@fmt.message key="layout.webpage.disclaimer"> <@fmt.param> <@fmt.param> <@fmt.param> <@fmt.param> - ADD page tab
<@hst.link var="jscommon" path="/js/js-common.js"/> <@hst.link var="jquerytools" path="/js/jquery.tools.min.js"/> <@hst.headContributions categoryIncludes="jsExternal"/> <@hst.headContributions categoryIncludes="jsInternal"/> <#if !composermode> <@ga.accountId/> <@hst.link var="googleAnalytics" path="/resources/google-analytics.js"/>
